section.title: Install the language editor plug-in
section.simpara: If you are planning to write a program using {proglang} and use Visual Studio Code (VSCode) as your editor, you can install the {proglang} language client plug-in for VSCode. The {proglang} plug-in provides syntax highlighting, type information, and auto-completion features.

listitem.simpara: Download and install Visual Studio Code, if it not already installed on your local computer.
Type motoko in the Search field.
Select the Motoko language support published by DFINITY Foundation, then click Install.

section.simpara: If your program has dependencies, you might also want to install the Vessel package manager for {proglang}. For instructions, see the ReadMe. To download the latest release, go to the vessel GitHub repository.
